name: Simpson_D_Polly the Parrot_A Duck It Spinoff

description:
Simpson_D_Polly the Parrot_A Duck It Spinoff is an adventure game developed by DTC 354. It came out on 23-11-2022.
You can play Simpson_D_Polly the Parrot_A Duck It Spinoff on Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
